Suddenly your friend serena shows up on the roof with you as she removes her shoes and socks to reveal her well kept yet sweat feet. You blushed a little as you stare at them. "Good morning (insert your name here) you seemed like you slept well" she throws in a quick smile at you. You look at her and then respond "uh......yeah hehe" you soon get out of bed. "Well you know what to do after all you are the kalos champ." You mom finishes as she soon leaves. After she left you gave your self a quick stretch and a yawn before getting dressed in your usual outfit and head out the door to met your friends. As like when your first met your friends Serena and Shauna where there waiting for you. "Hey guys" you greeted them as you exit your house "where's everyone else". "They couldn't make it today due to their training" Shauna informs you. "But hey we can still hang out as just the three of us right?" Serena ask you. You look at Serena as she speaks and you remember your dream that your had. "Well...of course!" You say after snapping back into reality. Serena then asks"do what do you wanna do?".

info.brief_description: Worship the feet of all the trainer girls from kanto to kalos
info.description:
In this story you will take control of the male trainer from X and Y (since he's the most customizable) and will go out on a quest but not for pokemon no for a bigger prize......TRAINER GIRL FEET! (Btw all girls are around 18 or19 as this takes place after your main character is the champion)
Anyway here are some rules:
1.the girls can shirk the main character but only using minimize ok? Their not goddesses their just girls
2.the main character can die
3.keep it most foot related but a few butt and boobs related things are ok
4.gives your chapter some length!
5.and should have to bring this up but I will just in case NO MALE FEET!
6.have fun
